title: Global Cinema
description: This course examines selected movements, styles, and trends in world cinema, emphasizing how contemporary film's global nature affects cultural representation.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ENGL 1102 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C and (LMC 2000 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or LMC 2500 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or LMC 2400 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C)
